revised_title: A Study of Unsymmetrical Cyanine Dyes Absorption Spectra
tldr: The authors conducted a study on the absorption spectra of unsymmetrical cyanine dyes, combining different heterocyclic nuclei to understand how the absorption maximum of each unsymmetrical cyanine dye relates to the symmetrical dyes. They prepared 105 unsymmetrical cyanines and examined their absorption spectra, finding that the correlation of frequencies of maximum absorption with changes in chemical constitution was interesting and provided insights into the properties of these dyes.
